title: Speed Limits in Designated Zones
summary: Sets maximum speed limits in specific areas as indicated by official signage.

title: Pedestrian Crossover Regulations
summary: Requires vehicles to yield at designated pedestrian crossovers where signage is posted.

title: Heavy Vehicle Road Restrictions
summary: Prohibits heavy trucks and commercial vehicles from using certain roads except for local deliveries.

title: Bus Stop Parking Restrictions
summary: Prohibits stopping any vehicle other than a bus in designated bus stops.

title: No Stopping in a School Bus Loading Zone
summary: Prohibits stopping any vehicle in a designated school bus loading zone.

title: Accessible Parking Regulations
summary: Prohibits parking in designated accessible spaces without a valid permit.

title: Prohibition on Increased Fees for Accessible Parking
summary: Prohibits charging higher parking fees for vehicles displaying valid accessible permits.

title: Parking Violations and Fines
summary: Defines violations and fines for illegal parking under the city's administrative penalty system.
